name: 郭天穎
objective:
本課程介紹各種常用之進階影像處理理論，課程內容含蓋：
１. 空間域影像強化
２. 頻域影像強化
３. 影像還原
４. 彩色影像處理
５. 型態學影像處理
６. 影像分割 
7. 物件辨認 
8. 小波理論

This course contains the advanced topics in digital image compression. It includes 1 Image Enhancement in Spatial Domain 2. Image Enhancement in Frequency Domain 3. Image Restoration 4.Color Image Processing 5. Morphological Image Processing 6. Image Segmentation 7. Object Recognition 8. Wavelet and Multiresolution Processing
schedule:
week1　　Introduction
week2-3　　Digital Image Fundamentals
week4-5　　Image Enhancement in Spatial Domain
week6-8　　Image Enhancement in Frequency Domain
week9-10　　Morphological Image Processing
week11-12　　Image Segmentation
week13-14　　Image Restoration
week15-16　　Color Image Processing
week17-18 Final Prject
